Summary: Vanessa at the bar was great! I would definitely stay there again. Other staff was friendly as well. Very clean and well maintained. Look forward to coming again with my family and friends during football season
Manager Response: none

Summary: Shoutout to Vanessa who gave great service at the restaurant- she was helpful and kind and gave good recommendations on wine and food selections. Overall a great stay, and thanks Vanessa for making our night great!
Manager Response: Hello,   We appreciate you taking the time to inform us of how your stay went. We are proud to hear that Vanessa was able to provide you with excellent guest service. I will make sure her leadership team is made aware of this as well. We hope you chose to stay with us again next time your travels bring you our area. Thank you

Summary: *****5 STAR CUSTOMER SERVICE***** From start to finish, I was extremely pleased with my stay.  Brandon at check-in was very very polished and professional in appearance and demeanor. He was able to get me a quiet location, which was even more appreciated after a stressful few days leading up to the trip. His compassion made my day.  Instead of fetching take-out and a bottle of wine at the grocery store - after my 4 hour drive - Brandon suggested the option of just walking a few steps to the right and let Will take care of my food beverage for the evening. BINGO! Like Brandon, Will’s presence  was 5-star. I had one of the best reds, thanks to Will’s suggestion of a Rodney Strong blend, and the carnitas nachos were delicious (and ample), as well. Great conversationalist!  These
Room tip: Don’t forget to bring a swimsuit!!!
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to inform us on how your stay went. We are extremely proud that Brandon and William had a positive impact on your stay. I will make sure to partner with their leadership teams to make sure they get the recognized for their great Guest Service. If you have any further questions or comments, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. We hope to host you again soon.

Summary: Brandon and Vanessa were wonderful. I had a trip from heck getting here and they were so cheerful and welcoming . I felt so welcomed after a long and stressful day. I travel a lot and I always stay with Marriott.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to inform us on how your stay went. We will be making sure to partner with Brandon and Vanessa to make them aware of comments as a way to celebrate their wonderful work. Thank you and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Excellent hotel with views of a pond surrounded by buildings - creating a quiet enclave. Walking distance to South Coast Plaza and Segerstrom Center for the Arts. Great staff who are very attentive to all the guests needs. Paris and Brenda at the front desk have been wonderful during my stays - helping get the right room. Sabrina has been fantastic with all my questions and extremely upbeat. Eustolia from the back office has taken her time to help me.  William is amazing - one of the very best at any hotel - he will be a huge asset to Marriott in the future. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to inform us of your stay! we are extremely proud to read that Paris, Brenda, William, Sabrina, and Eustolia had a great impact on your stay. We will make sure to partner with their leadership teams to advise them of your comments. We hope to see you again soon

Summary: Convenient to SNA airport and a manageable size.  The room lighting is limited, the bed was comfortable and the rooms feature small balconies (no furniture).  The bathroom was average size but had a small sink area.   The air conditioner in my room (room #1024) would not turn on and it was close to midnight when I checked in, so I slept with the door to the balcony open all night.  I had it set to 66 degrees and hot air instead of cool air was pumping out.  The room temperature quickly reached almost 80 degrees before I realized it wasn’t cooling off.  The hotel has a M Club which offered breakfast, but no bottled water, just a water station with small cups – bring your own bottle to refill! Parking was $33 in garage right next to hotel entrance.
Manager Response: Dear PaigeLO, Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience.  Our apologies for the cooling in your guestroom and hope this experience does not discourage you from returning in the future.  We hope to welcome you back on your next visit to Costa Mesa.

Summary Heading: Costa Mesa Marriott Top Notch Service
Summary: The Costa Mesa Marriott is a fantastic hotel with top-notch amenities and excellent customer service. Great location The hotel staff is particularly noteworthy for their kindness and attentiveness. In particular, I was impressed with the reception team, William, Nashina, Brenda and Eustolia who went above and beyond to make my 95-year-old mother's stay as comfortable as possible. They were gracious, friendly and always willing to assist her with anything she needed. The suite was spacious, clean, and well-appointed, with comfortable beds and all the necessary amenities. The on-site restaurant and club room was also a highlight, offering delicious meals and a great selection of drinks. Overall, I highly recommend the Costa Mesa Marriott for anyone visiting the area. It is an
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to inform us on how your stay was. We are glad to hear that you and your family enjoyed it. I will make sure to pass your message along to William, Nashita, Brenda, and Eustolia and their leaderships team so they get recognized for their great work. We hope to see you again next time you are in the area, thank you

Summary Heading: Thank You for a Wonderful Holiday Party!
Summary: Our non-profit held a Holiday Party at the Costa Mesa Marriott in December, and we want to thank the catering manager, Chris, and the wonderful group of servers who worked all evening to create an incredible party for our members.  Despite us getting in their way as we decorated, they cheerfully set up everything in the banquet room and on the patio as we requested.  The buffet line was amazing - everyone kept talking about the wonderful food!  The employees were there all night, available if we had any problems (which we didn't), keeping the buffet line full and keeping a close eye on what needed to be done to keep everything running smoothly.  Our guests had such a wonderful time, and we can't thank the Marriott employees enough for making this such a smooth, elegant event.
Room tip: The catering manager, Chris, is wonderful to work with.  He always responds to emails, and he is...
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for chosing our hotel to hold your Holiday Party, it brings us great joy to hear that it was a great success. I will pass along this note to our Food and Beverage Manager Oscar and the Banquets team, we also want to thank you for taking the time to inform us of how the event went. We hope you to see you again soon, should you have any more comments or questions please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Summary Heading: Service over and above my expectations
Summary: I stay at this property at least once a month for a week, sometimes two weeks a month for the past two years.  I am always impressed by the service of the staff, especially William.  He truly goes over, above and beyond to make my stay a great one.  No task is too difficult for William to find a solution to.  I have watched him with other guests and he is the consummate professional.  I highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Hello,  We appreciate you taking the time to inform us of your recent stay, and we want to thank you for chosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that William had such a positive impact on your stay, we will make sure to pass this information to his leadership team ! We hope to see you again next time you travels bring you back to this area. Thank you

Summary: The best place to stay and service is out of this world .. Everytime I stay here they go above and beyond. The rooms are extremely clean, the front desk makes it enjoyable.. Antonio the manager, Sabrina and Annie always make our stay wonderful
Manager Response: Hello,  We appreciate you taking the time to inform us of your recent stay, and we want to thank you for chosing to stay with us. We are extremely proud to hear that our staff had such a positive impact on your stay! We hope to see you again next time you travels bring you back to this area. Thank you

Summary Heading: For the price, go somewhere else
Summary: I was hesitant to leave a poor review because I am a loyal Marriott bonvoy member but after several attempts at contacting this hotel to refund my bill for $300 of miscellaneous charges with promises to refund me or no response at all I feel obligated to let folks know what they’re getting into here. The hotel is nice enough but for the price, truly not worth it. The first room we were in had black mold surrounding the entire exterior doors, I asked to be moved and they accommodated. They don’t tell you that you have to request house keeping by a certain time of day so when I requested house keeping because our sheets literally fell off the bed they told us too bad. The next room they put us in had a broken bathroom door, it’s a pocket door and was completely stuck inside the
Manager Response: Hello,  We deeply apologize for the inconveniences you went through while staying with us. This is definitely not how we want you to feel after checking out. I have passed your notes down to our housekeeping department so we can fix the problems (if they havent already been fixed) moving forward. As for the payment inquiries, I ask that you please reach out to me (Antonio, Front Office Manager) so I can assist with your bill inquiries. I look forward to hearing from you, have a great rest of your day and have a happy new year!

Summary: My second stay in two months in this particular hotel.  Mr. William the front desk supervisor is truly a great person with great knowledge and understanding.  He is gem and great asset to the Marriott organization.  It is employees like William that makes travel stays at the Marriott organization easy, efficient and pleasant.  I highly recommend Mr. William for his professional service to all guests.
Manager Response: Hello! We are honored to have hosted you twice these past couple of months. We appreciate your comments regarding William and your stay, and I will make sure to forward your message to him and his leadership team.  We look forward to hosting you again in the near future. Thank you

Summary: Great location and clean! Staff is real cool and there’s a consistently of clientele. Easy to walk everywhere. I been to this location three times and I was pleasantly pleased each time. I’m looking forward to going back. The food is also very good.
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for reaching out, we are glad you had a great visit. We look forward to hosting you again!   Thank you

Summary: We were in the area to attend a performance at Segerstrom and stayed at this property for the first time.  We were impressed.  Check-in was smooth, and we were given an upgraded room with a lovely view.  The room was spacious, and the shower was a definite plus.  The late-afternoon snacks at the M Club were great.  It was a short walk to Segerstrom that evening and the Orange County Art Museum the next morning.  We'll definitely be back.
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for staying with us, we are glad that your stay was great and peaceful. We look forward to hosting you again next time you are in the area.   Thank you!

Summary: We had a baby shower at this event and I just want to say that this venue was beautiful, the staff was amazing and we had the best experience. The food was great and the whole set up was amazing. Steven and the rest of the team were absolutely amazing!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, We are glad you chose to spend this special occasion with us. I will make sure to pass on the note about Steven to his leadership team. We look forward to hosting you and your family and friends again soon.   Until next time!

Summary Heading: Feels like a home away from home
Summary: I have booked with the Marriott Costa Mesa a few times for work and I always have a very comfortable stay. The rooms are spacious and the separate living room gives me a great work space. Mina was super attentive and gave great service for breakfast during my stay. Although I was slightly disappointed to receive a room on the front of the building this time, and not one facing the peaceful lake view, I was pleasantly surprised to get a beautiful sunrise the next morning with the mountains behind. Highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Carly R Thank you for choosing Costa Mesa Marriott for your home away from home and highlighting the service provided by Mina at our Amuse Restaurant.  I will be sure to thank her for making your experience memorable.  We look forward to having you back in the near future.

Summary: This is a surprisingly nice hotel in a very nice part of town.  I have stayed at a number of Marriott properties in the past and this rankes up there for cleanliness and overall quality of the room.  The check in was a breeze and staff were professional and helpful.  Room was down right large with a sitting room set up nicely and an excellent bathroom and shower.  The room was immaculate and the bed and bedding were of excellent quality.  There is also an awesome steak house half a block away I recommend highly.  The only quibbles I have is that there is no free breakfast (seems to be a thing in SoCal) and parking was $30 a night.  Overall, if I found myself in the area again I would defiantly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Eliyahu R, We are pleased to be your top Marriott for cleanliness and quality.  Our team members are committed in providing both.  We look forward to having you back when traveling to Costa Mesa.

Summary: For the record .. Heather makes the best Margarita in the whole wide world.   Love her energy and her service. Her manager served a margarita which was too spicy … and she was quick to fix.   Heather to the rescue .. Always!  Will definitely come back again.
Manager Response: Dear Gary M, We are trilled to read about Heather making the perfect Margarita.  She was your hero and glad she created a memorable experience.  We look forward to having you back for another Margarita.

Summary: I recently attended a banquet here at Costa Mesa Marriott hotel. Steve, Nick, and Fran were amazing and accommodated to all our needs. The food was also amazing and came out in a timely manner. If you ever want to book a venue, I highly recommend booking it here.
Manager Response: Thank you for attending an event at Costa Mesa Marriott.  I am delighted to read about our amazing staff and will personally thank them for making your event a success.

Summary: Such a great venue to hold events! The food was really really good and the staff, Steven, Nick, and Fran were amazing and so nice and helpful! The venue was really spacious and clean and everything was really Convenient and accessible for us I really recommend this place!:)
Manager Response: Thank you for hosting your event at Costa Mesa Marriott.  I am delighted to read about our amazing staff and will personally thank them for making your event a success.

Summary: We had an event held in one of the halls. The venue was very spacious and was able to hold all our guests. The food was delicious and well made. Steven, Nick, and Fran were very helpful throughout the night. Whenever we needed something, they were quick to help.
Manager Response: Thank you for hosting your event at Costa Mesa Marriott.  I am delighted to read about our amazing staff and will personally thank them for making your event a success.

Summary: This past weekend I had a sorority event held at this hotel and the staff was amazing! Steven, Nick, and Fran were super helpful and catered to all our needs. I definitely recommend having your events here if you’re looking for staff who are kind and cooperative.
Manager Response: Dear Kalyn P, Thank you for choosing Costa Mesa Marriott for your sorority event and sharing the amazing service provided by our team members.  I will be sure to thank them for making your event memorable.

Summary: Costa Mesa Marriott was so welcoming! Not only was the location beautiful but the banquet halls are so nicely put together and the staff were quick to tend to all of our needs. Steven, Nick and Fran were especially so sweet and i really appreciated their help throughout the event!
Manager Response: Dear April L, It was a pleasure welcoming you to Costa Mesa Marriott.  We appreciate you highlighting our helpful staff members and how they delivered spectacular service.  We hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Such a well planned event! Nick, Fran, and Steven were such great staff members and were super helpful. The service was outstanding and the place was beautifully decorated and am excited to come again!
Manager Response: Dear Annie V, Thank you for sharing your amazing event experience and mentioning our team members.  I will be sure to thank them for making your event memorable.  We look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: Absolutely beautiful event! Steve Nick and Fran were so helpful with planning our event and it turned out perfect. So glad that there’s so many helpful staff who are genuinely there to make everything a success. If you ever need to reach out to someone, reach out to those three!
Manager Response: Dear Angie D, We are pleased to read about your beautiful and perfect event.  Thank you for mentioning our team members and we look forward to having you back in the near future.

Summary: This is a great place to host events! The staff (Steven, Nick, and Fran) provided outstanding service throughout the night and were quick in helping answer any questions we had. Would recommend hosting events here and will be coming back!
Manager Response: Dear Amy T, I agree, we are a great place to host an event and glad you chose Costa Mesa Marriott.  Thank you for mentioning our great staff.  We look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: This place was the perfect spot to host an event. Steve, Nick, and Fran were why our event was a complete success. Their communication and urgency to help us were outstanding. Thank you so much and we will be coming again.
Manager Response: Dear Viviano, I agree, we are a perfect spot to host an event and glad you chose Costa Mesa Marriott.  Thank you for mentioning our great staff.  We look forward to having you back soon.

Summary Heading: Amazing Place to Hold an Event
Summary: My sorority had an event here this past weekend and it was honestly such a great venue. The service was top tier and the staff that helped us throughout it all is what really put it over the top! Steven, Nick, and Fran were so amazing and helpful. They are the reason our event was so memorable and exceeded our expectations. We will definitely be coming back because of them!
Manager Response: Dear Thanh h, We appreciate you sharing your event experience and look forward to having you host future events with us.  I am delighted to read about Steven, Nick, and Fran and I am grateful they provided a memorable experience.

Summary: I recently hosted an event and wanted to thank Christoper and Eustolia for helping me plan out from the very beginning smoothly. Also a huge thank you to Steven, Nick, and Fran for such an amazing dinner and service. I really couldn’t have asked for a better staff to work with. Highly recommend hosting here at Costa Mesa with these wonderful people who were so caring and will have all the attention to detail. Thank you guys I really appreciate you all for making such a memorable event for us. We love you guys!
Manager Response: Dear Di, Thank you for hosting your event at Costa Mesa Marriott.  I am delighted to read about our amazing staff and will personally thank them for making your event a success.

Summary: Steve, Nick, and Fran were so helpful during the entire event !! Food came quickly and any problems or concerns were figured out really fast. Our event went great due to their helpfulness!! Thank you so much <3
Manager Response: Dear Christy, I am delighted to read about your fun experience at your Costa Mesa Marriott event.  Thank you for mentioning our great staff and I will be sure to thank them for making your event memorable.

Summary: Hello,  I wanted to thank William Leahy for his devoted care in regard to my experience at Costa Mesa Marriott.  William is an over achiever and genuinely cares for each individual guest and their needs.  I was experiencing an issue checking in, and William went ABOVE and BEYOND to really listen to the issue at hand.  William’s problem solving and solution focused attitude is the perfect example of what I wish to see when I stay at a Marriott resort.  I stay with Marriott three quarters out of each year, and I have never been so impressed with the effort William exemplified to ensure my stay and check-in process was perfect.    We were near the point of cancelling our entire reservation and with William’s kindness, patience, and positive attitude towards helping us find a
Manager Response: Dear Jessica, I am delighted to read your comments about William.  We are fortunate to have him on our team and I will personally thank him for making your experience memorable.  We look forward to having you stay with us when visiting Costa Mesa.

Summary: So blown away by the service provided by Steven, Nick, and Fran! We held our sorority formals in their event space this past weekend and the staff was so attentive to our needs and quick to meet them. The venue space was roomy and beautifully decorated. Can’t thank them enough for making our event so memorable and organized!
Manager Response: Dear shelbypie Thank you for choosing Costa Mesa Marriott for your sorority formals.  We appreciate you highlighting our amazing staff.  I will be sure to thank Steven, Nick, and Fran for making your event memorable.

Summary Heading: Best property and hospitality/customer service in Costa Mesa! Thanks Sabrina!!!
Summary: Wow, can't say enough nice things about this particular manager named Sabrina (no wonder she is a manager). Our check-in had a few hiccups and she made it all right within a few hours. She went above and beyond what was expected, and we greatly appreciate all her efforts. Despite the issues, we will continue to make this property our main stay when we visit here once a month for business. All receptionists are very nice and helpful too.  This is a great property. The rooms are spacious and clean. There is a separate living room with a fold out sofa bed if needed. TV's in both rooms. There's a safe to lock your valuables and a refrigerator to keep your drinks and leftovers from previous meals cold. Most importantly, it is conveniently located near fine dining restaurants and a
Manager Response: Dear LeaP I apologize for the hiccups you experienced at check-in, however, thrilled to read Sabrina was able to make it right for you.  I will personally thank her for her service and for making your experience memorable.  We look forward to having you stay with us when visiting Costa Mesa!

Summary: Annie at the front desk went above and beyond to help me get the room I needed.  Such wonderful staff at the Costa Mesa Marriott. I have been impressed with the staff and how much they care about their guests.  The washer/dryer is a plus for a long stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jennyut, We appreciate you choosing us for your Costa Mesa visit.  I will personally thank Annie for making your arrival experience memorable.  I am very proud of our staff for taking genuine care of our guests.  Enjoy your visit to Costa Mesa.

Summary Heading: Great location and amazing customer service!
Summary: This review is beyond overdue as our stay at this location was absolutely fabulous because of the amazing service exemplified by Sabrina and William. They went above and beyond to ensure our stay was memorable, top notch, and will definitely be adding this location on our must stay list when visiting Costa Mesa and surrounding cities.  Thank you Sabrina and William for your exemplary hospitality and customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Eleina L We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience especially highlighting the service provided by Sabrina and William.  I will personally thank them for creating a memorable experience.  We look forward to having you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Best front desk experience I've had in a very long time!
Summary: We called to confirm our reservation with Anthony. He was so friendly and helpful! When we arrived Anthony also helped us check-in.  Smooth and easy! We can only hope the rest of our trip goes as well. Thank you Anthony!!
Manager Response: Dear StephanielJ6025NZ, We appreciate you highlighting your best front desk experience.  I will be sure to personally thank Anthony for making your experience memorable.  We hope to have you back to Costa Mesa in the near future.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 2 night mid September 2022. Had a wonderful visit. Everyone was so pleasant and helpful. The servers, bartenders and front desk people were great, especially Donna, Fran, Honey and William at the front desk.  We checked out and drove back to San Diego. When we arrived home, I realized I had left my toiletry bag hanging in the bathroom. I immediately called but I was told housekeeping manager was not in. I called back the following day and was told it was not in lost and found. She assured me she would check with housekeeping mgr. I was also told on Sunday night to submit a form online, which I immediately did. To make a long story short, I have now been calling both the hotel and corporate complaint office for nearly 3 weeks and have been given the
Manager Response: Dear Andrea H We appreciate you sharing your wonderful visit and highlighting the service provided by Donna, Fran, Honey, and William. Your comments will make their day and I am happy they were looking out for you.  In regards to your missing  toiletry bag, we take these claims very serious and are looking into the matter.  I apologize for the timing and effort in reaching us about the missing bag and can see how this has caused you frustration.  I invite you to contact me at hugo.barba@costamesamarriott.com as we continue to search for your missing bag.

Summary Heading: ALWAYS BE KIND BECAUSE YOU NEVER KNOW WHAT SOMEONE ELSE IS GOING THROUGH
Summary: It’s 12:30am and someone hits the power box that controls the electricity in our home: With elderly parents and kids, i had to act quickly and it was so late but MANNY WAS AMAZING.. just AMAZING! I would literally stay at this Marriott just so that I get service that MANNY provides! He made things easy for a flustered woman with a big family that had to leave their home in the middle of the night. MANNY, if you ever get to read this, thank you thank you thank you so much for your kindness, attentiveness and sharing so much aloha! Please don’t ever stop being you because everyone you come in contact with will leave blessed and happy!!!!! THANKS MANNY!
Manager Response: Dear Team_Cyriah Oh dear, losing power must have not been easy yet glad you chose Costa Mesa Marriott.  I will personally thank Manny for being AMAZING during your stay and helping you make things easy.  We appreciate the review and hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: Manny accommodated our all the requests. I was at this facility with my colleagues for few days . Great location . Very close to top rated Resturant and close to the mall . Thank you so much for great service Manny . Hope to see you soon .
Manager Response: Dear Adeel, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Costa Mesa Marriott.  I am thrilled to read about Manny making your experience memorable.  We look forward to having you back for your next visit to Costa Mesa.

Summary Heading: Anthony and William are the best!
Summary: My business has me traveling all over the world.  Consequently I have stayed at many Marriott properties across the globe.  My experience at the Costa Mesa marriott was, by far, the best.  We were faced with an unusual situation with our room accommodations.  We brought the issue to the attention of Anthony and William.  I was so impressed with their quick response and customer service!  These gentlemen did everything they could to make a bad situation disappear.  Thank you so much for the spectacular accommodations!  Anthony and William deserve to  be rewarded for their stellar customer service.  We can't thank you enough!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Janet, Thank You for taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing Anthony and William - Our Superstars! I am glad they were able to turn around the situation and create an incredible memory for you. Feedback like this, definitely fuels up our team to show up and remind us of how rewarding it is to do what we love to do! I will be sure to personally thank Anthony and William for providing phenomenal service. We truly appreciate your recognition of the service of our team!  We can't wait to welcome you back Janet!  Warm regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary: We had an extended stay and the location surrounded by beautiful gardens was fantastic. There often wasn’t enough staff to service the amount of customers. Fran was great and provided exceptional service, she looked after us and ensured we had everything we needed.
Manager Response: Dear Terence, Thank you for choosing to stay with us and recognizing phenomenal service provided by Fran. She is amazing! We will continue to work on our staffing needs. Your feedback is appreciated as it will assist us in improving and providing a more memorable stay for all of our guests. I will be sure to personally thank Fran for making your experience exceptional! Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future! Warm regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary Heading: Incredible Stay at Costa Mesa Marriott
Summary: My family and I felt in love with this Marriott hotel in Costa Mesa. The rooms are very clean and modern. The staff is very helpful and friendly. My kids loved the pool area. Starbucks is a short walk from the hotel and its near many restaurants to choose from. We are very happy with our stay and we look forward in staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Ernesto, I am thrilled to read you had an incredible stay at the Costa Mesa Marriott. I appreciate you highlighting our team members, spacious modern remodeled rooms and our prime location. I’m glad, kids enjoyed our big  pool to beat this summer heat.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon Ernesto! Stay cool. Warm regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary Heading: Amazing Stay at Costa Mesa Marriott
Summary: The stay at Costa Mesa Marriott was amazing. The staff is very friendly and courteous. Fran, Paris, Akram and William were always there to help and ensured I got everything I needed. This was one of the best experiences I've had. Thank you for everything! 👍🏻
Manager Response: Dear Aditya, Thank You for taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing Fran, Paris, Akram and William - Our Superstars! Feedback like this, definitely fuels up our team to show up and remind us of how rewarding it is to do what we love to do!  We truly appreciate your recognition of the service of our team! We can't wait until we welcome you back Aditya! Warm regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary: Marie in the bar/lounge provides outstanding service; super attentive to customers and just a pleasure to talk to!  One of the biggest reasons why I have always stayed at the CM Marriot, and will continue to do so going forward.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin, I am pleased to read about your wonderful lounge experience. I especially enjoyed reading about phenomenal service provided by Marie. I will be sure to thank Marie for being amazing. We look forward to welcome you back soon. Take care Kevin! Warm regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary: The Marriott is perfectly located just south of South Coast mall.  Well maintained property with  Maria as the dynamic bartender in the lobby bar.  She helps set the mood in the lobby, knows her regular customers and wants to know everyone's name.
Manager Response: Dear Mark, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I appreciate you highlighting the service provided by Marie. She is phenomenal and I am thrilled to read your positive compliments. I am very proud of our team and their commitment in creating memorable experiences for our guests. I will be sure to personally thank Marie for making your experience exceptional. Thank You for your empowering words. We can't wait to welcome you back. Take care Mark! Warm Regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary: Coming in by plane on 1 hour of sleep and getting ready to officiate my niece’s wedding the same afternoon … I asked if there was any way possible we could get in our room early for naps! Esveidy did NOT hesitate to make it happen! She made my day — and made my niece’s wedding day much smoother too! I have not experienced such gracious and kind customer service at a hotel like Esveidy did! Thank you Marriott Costa Mesa & Esveidy!
Manager Response: Dear Steve, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and highlighting the phenomenal service you received from Esveidy. She is outstanding and we are truly blessed to have her representing our hotel. It is always encouraging to hear positive feedback, particularly when it comes from those who matter the most - YOU! Your compliments will be shared with Esveidy and the entire team as a way of celebrating the great guest experiences we delivered.  Thank You for the recognition. We can’t wait to welcome you back soon!  Warm regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary: Great stay! Marie in the bar is so sweet ! She was so kind and brought us a great dessert. So friendly and nice! Sabrina at the front desk was great too. Very nice and very attentive . We will be back again soon. John and Kim
Manager Response: Dear John and Kim, Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience. I appreciate you highlighting the service provided by Marie and Sabrina. They both are phenomenal! I will be sure to personally thank them for making your experience memorable. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Warm regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary: I stayed at this Marriott 2 times and had the best experience.The reason that I came back a second time was because of the friendly staff,especially Marie.She is the absolute best.Love you Maria, Gail
Manager Response: Dear gailbD2913FF, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I appreciate you highlighting the service provided by Marie. She is phenomenal and we are incredibly blessed to have her representing our hotel. Feedback like this, definitely fuels up our team to show up and remind us of how rewarding it is to do what we love to do! I am very proud of our team and their commitment in creating memorable experiences for our guests. I will be sure to personally thank Marie for making your experience exceptional. Thank You for your kind words. We can't wait to welcome you back soon! Warm Regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary Heading: This is the definition of awesome service!
Summary: The only reason I came back here after 10 years was to see if Marie was still as awesome as she was 10 years ago! And you know what…she was even more freakin’ awesome and joined by the delightful Fran, both delivering 100% service service service! If any hospitality venue wants to blueprint what excellence looks like, spend a night at the bar @ Costa Mesa Marriott with Marie 👏🏻
Manager Response: Dear Road63070916151, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, returning back at the bar to see Marie and her outstanding service which she is well known for. I appreciate you highlighting the service provided by Marie and Fran. They both are amazing and we are lucky to have them representing our hotel. I will be sure to personally thank them for making your experience memorable. Thank You for your kind words. We will see you next time sooner. Until then, take care! Warm Regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary: The Costa Mesa location is fantastic. We walked to South Coast Plaza in 8 minutes and the area is beautiful. The paths around the lake behind the hotel make for a nice walk and a great view from our room.   From the moment we checked in, we were treated like valued long-time guests by Brenda. She was the standout at The Costa Mesa Marriott among the great people we interacted with there. She is the perfect blend of friendly and professional. We will definitely choose this location again over others in the area, largely due to the exceptional customer service from her.
Manager Response: Dear Road735501, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and highlighting the phenomenal service provided by Brenda. Exceptional associates who exceed guest expectations are a source of pride at Marriott. Brenda is amazing and we are incredibly blessed to have her representing our hotel. I have personally thanked Brenda for making your stay memorable. Thank You for your kind words and we look forward to welcome you back soon. Warm Regards,  Rajvi Shah

Summary: I had a wonderful time at the Marriott Costa Mesa! I throughly enjoyed the bar, dining area, and outside patio with the blue lights looking over the pool!! Very modern, very chic! Heather and Marie were absolutely fantastic! I look forward to coming back!
Manager Response: Dear lowekm I am pleased to read about your amazing and wonderful Costa Mesa Marriott experience.  I especially enjoy reading about service provided by our team members.  I will be sure to thank Heather and Marie for being fantastic.  We look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: The Marriott has modern and spacious bar area. I enjoyed sitting outside by the fire and blue light. Heather, my server was amazing. She’s funny and friendly. I will definitely come back and look for her again.
Manager Response: Dear deehB I appreciate you taking the time to share your fun night at our restaurant aMuse.  I will personally thank Heather for being amazing and providing friendly service.  I look forward to having you back for a bite and beverage at aMuse.

Summary: Heather, Patrick, Fran, and Marie do a great job behind the bar and have a ton of positive energy! I love hanging out with them whenever im in town and they keep you thoroughly entertained. The M Club personnel is also super friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Emanuell Thank you for taking the time to share your Costa Mesa Marriott experience.  I appreciate you highlighting the service provided by Heather, Patrick, Fran, and Marie.  I will be sure to personally thank them for making your experience memorable.  We look forward to having you back to hang with our great team!

Summary: Something got messed up with my booking so I was panicking and was frantically calling and messaging the chat box. Brenda helped me through the whole process to rebook my stay smoothly. Next day when I showed up to check in, she remembered me and greeted us very warmly. Shes so sweet and is amazing at her job! Thank you again Brenda!
Manager Response: Dear 452estherj,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and highlighting the phenomenal service you received from Brenda. She is amazing and we are truly lucky to have her representing our hotel. It is always encouraging to hear positive feedback, particularly when it comes from those who matter the most - YOU! Your compliments will be shared with Brenda and the entire team as a way of celebrating the great guest experiences we delivered.  Thank You for the recognition.  We will see you next time. Until then, take care!  Warm regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary Heading: Best spot in the Costa Mesa hotel selection.
Summary: Best bar and staff.  Best food, not you’re normal Marriott menu. Clean big rooms. I’m a believer switched from the Westin. Heather, Marie, and Richard are the best bar crew ever! Great hotel, very quiet and clean.
Manager Response: Dear gerrys710, Thank You for taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing Heather, Marie and Richard - Our Superstars! Feedback like this, definitely fuels up our team to show up and remind us of how rewarding it is to do what we do! I am incredibly blessed to be working with such amazing people who love what they do, and it clearly shows in how they take care of guests like yourself. We truly appreciate your recognition of the service of our team! I’m glad you enjoyed your spacious room with delicious food at the Amuse restaurant. We can't wait until we welcome you back! Warm regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary: This hotel is so nice and updates. My room was immaculate and spacious. It overlooked the pond and pool. Manny at the front desk was so pleasant and accommodating. I will definitely stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Hello lasinaj,  I appreciate you taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing Manny. We are blessed to have an amazing team that love taking great care of our guests. I have personally thanked Manny for making your stay comfortable. Our hotel is newly renovated with the largest standard rooms in market.  I’m glad you enjoyed our spacious, clean rooms with the lake view.  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary: You are without doubt one of my favorite places to stay when traveling. From all the personnel who are all Fab!! the location of the hotel amenities and now that the M club is open which is large and spacious, the cleanliness and general upkeep are all pluses,  I can highly recommend this hotel.   Add to this easy parking, easy and quick access to the rooms! Set in a tranquil area on Anton Blvd and yet close all that Costa Mesa has to offer.   Looking forward to the my next stay!
Manager Response: Dear James, I am thrilled to read Costa Mesa Marriott is your favorite place when traveling.  I appreciate you highlighting our team members, cleanliness, MClub, and our location.  We look forward to having you back when traveling to Costa Mesa.

Summary: We wanted take the time to recognize Brend R. At the front desk.  She went above and beyond during our stay to make sure we were taken care of.  She was a professional the entire time during her shift/hours at the front desk from check-in to check-out.  Awesome Job!!!
Manager Response: Dear Climber, Thank you for taking the time to recognize the above and beyond service provided by Brenda.  I have personally thanked her for making your experience memorable.  We trust you will choose Costa Mesa Marriott should your travels bring you back to Orange County and we look forward to having you back.

Summary: We were so pleased with this hotel. We had to leave a hotel we were in due to noise and when we got to the Marriott we were exhausted and frustrated. Nicholas placed us in the perfect room and allowed us to check in early. He was so kind and empathetic as well as professional and helpful. We loved how clean, open, airy the rooms were as well as how accommodating the staff was to our needs. We also loved the pool and outdoor grounds and patio. It was nice to go on a walk in the evening around the hotel. The restaurant in the lobby, Amuse, was delicious and the staff was so friendly. We were able to travel easily to restaurants and beaches. We would highly recommend this hotel if you’re staying in the Costa Mesa area.
Manager Response: Dear mariarN3762RO Thank you for choosing Costa Mesa Marriott after experiencing noise at another hotel.  I am thrilled to read about Nicholas and our staff taking well care of you during your stay.  I am very proud of our team and their commitment in creating memorable experiences for our guests.  We look forward to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Nice and clean with great service
Summary: So hello, our family chose your location because it looked great and was close to the beach. Our family is here together because we have a funeral on Sinday and this was a great place to just gather before we the memorial of our beloved sister.. The rooms were clean and the beds were super comfy.  l love the staff especially William  and Savitri (also known as honeybee). They were super helpful and went above and  beyond to make us feel comfortable  during this time. I would definitely  return. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear 644chayal, I appreciate the time you have taken to share your recent experience and highlighting the service provided by William and Savitri.  I will be sure to thank them both for making your stay comfortable.  I extend my condolences for your loss and look forward to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Service and Housekeeping need to step up.
Summary: Upon check in, I specifically asked for a quiet room. The clerk, gave me a room on the 2nd floor facing the street which is the worst for noise. We heard cars revving up and down the street all night and we used our ear plugs We couldn’t sleep so we asked to move rooms. The clerk who helped up, was somewhat helpful but refused to bring the key to the room so that I didn’t have to walk down and back up to move my stuff. I was fine but the answer but the way she said it was rude with a short NO. Wow. Checked into the second room and found that the bathroom had pubic hair and long hairs from the previous guest, red Stains on the shower floor, missing toiletries and a semi broken shower lever. We asked for the room to be cleaned with specific feedback about the shower and the shower
Manager Response: My name is Rajvi Shah. I am the Front Office Manager here at the Marriott, Costa Mesa. Thank you for taking some time to share your experience.  Receiving warm and friendly service from our staff sets the tone for a great stay. This was not your experience, and I sincerely apologize for failing to meet your expectations. We take all service failures seriously and I will work with leadership team to make sure we are delivering great customer service to all of our guests.  Thank for you for recognizing William, he is a great team player!  We would love an opportunity to discuss your experience further.  Please reach out to me at rajvi.shah@costamesamarriott.com or you may call the hotel at 714.957.1100  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Rajvi Shah

Summary: Stay here for just one night hotel is comfortable had little issues - phone in my room did not work, no big deal, and the tub needed to be reglazed besides that great location bar was fun had lots of friendly people staff was awesome Sabrina at the front desk was super personable went above and beyond. Sabrina help to recommend restaurant near by that was excellent.thank you!!
Manager Response: Hello Michelle D,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing Sabrina.  Our goal is to connect with all of our guests and provide a wonderful experience.  It’s great to hear you had fun at our bar and enjoyed nearby restaurant.  Thanks for heads up on phone and tub.  We have project scheduled for tub repair, sorry we couldn’t have it completed prior to your stay.    Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary Heading: Nice property, amenities and service need improvement.  M Club is not open on weekends.
Summary: Nice property, the rooms are all suites, with a door to the bedroom and a pullout sofa, so good for those with kids.   BUT, wow on the food situation.  There is a M Club, but apparently we arrived for the first time that it closed on Friday.   The front desk was unaware of this and kept telling us they would be stocking it and it was open 24/7.  Finally asked the server at the bar and he informed us that the M Club was closed for the weekend.   (After waiting close to an hour with kids).  He told us breakfast would be available in the morning - we are Ambassador status. Well guess what a cluster the next. Opening was! The breakfast buffet was similar to Residence Inn breakfast, except less bread/pastry options.  Eggs were out more than 30 minutes before they brought more.  Then
Manager Response: Hello Michele H,  Thank you for taking some time to share your experience.  I’m thrilled with positive comments regarding property, suite rooms, staff and area around hotel.  I’m disappointed that our food offerings didn’t meet the mark.  We are still working through opening M Club Monday through Friday and providing Marriott Brand Standard offerings to Elite Members when M Club is closed over the weekends.  We have determined to be a buffet only option on the weekends to provide a quicker dining experience to all guests.  I will review your comments with my operational leaders to determine how we communicate offerings to our guests and make sure we are taking care of our Elite Members.  I hope you will provide us another opportunity to win your business the next time you are in our area.  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: Great hotel. Front desk staff (Anthony) was extremely helpful. Took time to explain things and help out with late check-in.   New hotel and clean premises. Will surely visit again when back with the family.
Manager Response: Hello Rahul S,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing Anthony.  Our goal is to connect with all of our guests.  I’m thrilled Anthony was able to take care of you.  Love your mention of our new hotel.  We infused $17 Million to renovate all of our guest rooms, public spaces, relocated bar, added bar patio and M Club.  It’s great to hear that our enhancements hit the mark and guests such as yourself are enjoying their experience with us.  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary Heading: Just plain horrible.  Avoid at all cost
Summary: I arrived in my room yesterday and 1030 pm and noticed that the room was flooded.  There was a leak in the faucet.  I was asked if I needed more towels to circumvent the problem.  I requested to move rooms as I was unsure if it might get worse.  No assistance was provided in helping me move my belongings.  I was woken at 6 am due to noise from the construction site next door.  I requested to talk to Rajvi, the front desk manager about my concerns.  It wasn’t until 330pm today that I was able to contact her.  She requested that I move rooms immediately as they needed my room.  I requested assistance to move my belongings and was told they could not help me as they were checking in guests. I was also told that housekeeping could not help me as they are already gone for the day. As
Manager Response: Hello Richard C,  Thank you for taking some time to share your experience.  Sorry you had a challenge when checking in and with assistance on your room move.  We take all service failures seriously and I will work with team to make sure we are delivering great customer service to all of our guests.  Thanks for your loyalty to Marriott as a Titanium guest, I'm sorry for our shortcomings.      Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: Disappointed with the quality and service on this stay. I expected more from Marriott, especially in Orange County, CA.  Took us requesting 3 separate rooms before we were satisfied. From unclean to peeling tub shower, to one twin bed in our two doubles room…seems like they were just hoping we would “settle”. Willy finally accommodated us. Maybe the franchise should change the name of the hotel to  reflect the lesser quality, or charge significantly less for the room.
Manager Response: Hello Kim Daudert,  Thank you for taking some time to share your experience.  I apologize for the frustrations you encountered.  I have shared your comments with my leaders to make sure no guest has this experience in the future.  I can assure you we will improve and make sure no guest has similar experience going forward.  I hope you will provide us another opportunity to win your business the next time you are in our area.  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: William greeted us with the upmost respect & kindness the  minute we walked in .  He truly represents the Marriott brand proudly . His willingness to try and accommodate any request we had speaks volumes for his character . We look forward to repeat visits to the Costa Mesa Marriott In the near future .  Thanks again for making us feel at home.
Manager Response: Hello Roc Henry,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing William.  We are lucky to have him representing our hotel and truly appreciate the way he connects with all of our guests.  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: Starting with check in, William L. was great, super friendly, gave us a lake view room! We were staying in town for sad circumstances, (family member with cancer), the staff, Especially William L. made us feel right at home and comforted us!  All the staff members encountered were very friendly and nice!  Hotel has been recently renovated, all suites with a separate living room with TV, desk, coffee maker, fridge!   Bed was super comfy, very nice bathroom with rainfall showerhead and great lighting (my wife LOVES well lit bathrooms!)   View of the lake and surrounding hotels/buildings was excellent!   I'm a Marriott Gold Elite member, and this is probably the nicest Marriott I've stayed in anywhere in the country!   Would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hello Jim C,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience.  Sorry that you were staying with us due to sad circumstances.  I’m thrilled my team and especially William made your experience very comfortable, so all you had to concentrate on was family and loved ones.    I appreciate you noticing our $17 Million Renovation that updated guest rooms, public spaces, relocated bar, added bar patio and M Club.  It’s great to hear that our enhancements hit the mark and guests such as yourself are enjoying their experience with us.   Thank you for your review, it will allow me to celebrate our team.  These comments are great motivation to our team on how our actions and connecting with our guests can make a difference.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: Wonderful staff with great attitudes, very helpful and accommodating.   Great hotel for business stays. Other than the gym being quite small (it’s crowded with 3-4 people in it), I had a great stay and would recommend it.
Manager Response: Hello Jared C,  I appreciate you taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing our wonderful associates.    Sorry about the feeling of gym being crowded with 3-4 people.  This is the first time I received comments regarding gym being small as we have 4 elliptical, 4 treadmills, 1 recumbent bike, 1 Peloton bike, cable weights, dumbbell weights and stretching area all spaced out.    Thank you for your review as we always look for ways to improve.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: One of my favorite hotel stays if not my TOP favorite.  This place is stunning.  It's clean, fresh, renovated, modern with good sized rooms.  The views from the balconies are perfection.  The pool and hot tub are resort like.  The staff is wonderfully friendly.  The restaurant and bar in the lobby is great and convenient, although understaffed for the demand.  There is a sizable gym and laundry available (extremely expensive though)  Like always, getting housekeeping is very difficult and on a schedule, but that has been everywhere.  I can't wait to stay here again when I find myself in Costa Mesa
Manager Response: Hello DJ Plunkett,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience.  Appreciate you noticing our $17 Million Renovation that updated guest rooms, public spaces, relocated bar, added bar patio and M Club.  Our guest rooms are not only the newest they are the largest standard rooms in our area.  We have some beautiful views overlooking our pool and lake.  We look forward to more guests enjoying our beautiful transformation and our wonderful team.  We will continue to dial in on the staffing needs as our ultimate goal is for each guest to have an amazing stay.  Exciting times at the Costa Mesa Marriott!    Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back to one of your favorite hotels in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: Clean and modern! But to top it off it had amazing service. Specifically, Jeremy lent me his own iPhone charger and went above and beyond (he literally went outside and checked his car for a spare). I will stay here outside of work events!
Manager Response: Hello Amber K,  I appreciate you taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing Jeremy.  I’m thrilled to hear that he went out of his way to take care of you.  Our hotel is newly renovated with the largest standard rooms in market.  I’m glad you enjoyed our spacious, clean and quite rooms.  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: A bit shout out to All at Costa Mesa Marriott. Second visit and so glad to experience such wonderful service from the whole crew! Namely, Chris Vanessa Sabrina Elisa Winston Rajiv Shah,. If I forgot someone my apology.   Everything about the property allows for an easy hustle   free stay.   Looking forward to my next stay!
Manager Response: Hello James C,  I appreciate you taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing our wonderful associates.  We are lucky to have such amazing people that love taking great care of our guests.    Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: New M lounge was open 6a-10p with excellent breakfast with hot and cold food, pastries, bagels, juice etc. Snacks were offered 5-7p (no food).  There was ample space, very modern, clean, 2 large TVs and quiet for privacy.  Key card was required for entry but manager was still asking for room numbers. For safety, room numbers should not be asked for verbally. Other alternate methods are available to identify elite members.  The hotel had a nice lake in the back for a safe walk and green areas and rocks for animals.  One laundry room with two washers and dryers were available but $3.50 a wash was a little steep.  Overall, I would highly recommend the hotel.  The rooms were really nice and having a parking garage on site was nice.
Manager Response: Hello Gerry H,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience.  I'm glad you were able to enjoy our new M Club lounge, lake and surrounding area.  I appreciate your insight about safety as that is a top priority at our hotel.    Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: Chris, William and Rajvi were awesome! They exceeded my expectations as a Titanium Elite. I will definitely be back again and will recommend the property to everyone I come in contact with.   The property was clean and the entire staff was awesome!
Manager Response: Hello Gentleman007,  I appreciate you taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing our wonderful associates.  Chris, William and Rajvi are awesome and always take great care of our guests.  I’m glad you were able to enjoy our newly renovated hotel.    Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: The rooms went thru a complete major (rip out) complete rehab.  The hotel use to be the Marriott Suites which allowed to many years to pass before renovating.  The double glass doors,  bathrooms, and old decrepit red carpet were ripped out and replaced with a single door, gray colors and a very modern but small bathroom.  The beds were very comfortable but the new sofa bed was small with thin mattress, AC was still old and loud, toilet had a minor sewer smell, and AC was turned off by housekeeping and very hot upon arrival.  All furniture is the room and bathroom was new.  The hotel put in a M lounge on the lobby floor but it has yet to open. One reason was we need to hire someone and another was the supply chain (but they had food for the restaurant).  The hotel has its own
Manager Response: Hello Bev2227,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience.  Appreciate you noticing our $17 Million Renovation that updated guest rooms, public spaces, relocated bar, added bar patio and M Club.  Our guest rooms are not only the newest they are the largest standard rooms in our area.  We have some beautiful views overlooking our pool and lake.  As for the M Club our team should have shared the exciting news it’s opening March 6th.    We look forward to more guests enjoying our beautiful transformation.  Exciting times at the Costa Mesa Marriott!    Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: Spent a night in this lovely hotel . I was impressed! All the rooms are suites from what I understand and it was spacious , clean , and quiet ! The bathroom had great amenities. Rajvi  Shah checked me in speedily and was very pleasant.  I requested a late check out and she offered me a special rate which was very reasonable.  When I saw her at check out she called me by my name! That’s impressive. I will be back ! Keep up the good work and warm hospitality.
Manager Response: Hello Bobby G,  I appreciate you taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing Rajvi.  She is wonderful!  Our hotel is newly renovated with the largest standard rooms in market, yes every room is a suite.  I’m glad you enjoyed our spacious, clean and quite rooms.  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: Everything from start to finish was perfect. I was greeted by the Front Desk Supervisor, Chris who was all smiles with great energy at 10:30pm, wow! As an Elite member, I had informed them of my late arrival and my keys were already waiting for me. Chris even called me as soon as I walked in my room to make sure that everything was comfortable. Waiting in my room was also a handwritten welcome note from Rajvi Shah, the Front Desk Manager. Such a nice touch!  I was fortunate enough to get a 9th floor lake and pool view suite. Their rooms were newly renovated with gigantic flat screen TVs in both the bedroom and living room.   The next day, I had the pleasure of meeting Steven from the bar. It was a busy morning but that did not stop him from being attentive and friendly towards
Manager Response: Hello IslandGirl1995,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing our wonderful associates.  Chris, Rajvi, Steven and Vanessa are great representatives of our entire team at Costa Mesa Marriott.  We enjoy our newly renovated hotel and love our associates.  The combination provides a great experience for all our guests.   Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Marriott Costa Mesa for a total of 10 nights to visit our daughter for her 25th birthday. We met Marie who is the bartender/server during our stay and wanted to write this review.  She was extremely friendly and helpful and made a great old fashioned.  We will definitely come back and stay there as she made our stay amazing! Marie made us feel very welcoming and it felt like we knew her most of our lives. Again, she was over the top friendly and her customer service was second to none!
Manager Response: Hello Walter M,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing Marie.  She is amazing and we are truly lucky to have her representing our hotel.  Happy Belated Birthday to your daughter.  We appreciate you spending that special moment with us.  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: We have been staying at this hotel for years and have always enjoyed it. Very nice and helpful staff, especially Ms Rajiv Shah whom we met for the first time. Rooms are very nice,  comfortable and clean. All in all I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Renate V,  Thank you for your loyalty to our hotel, we truly appreciate your business.  I appreciate you sharing your experience and recognizing Rajvi and team.  Our goal is to connect with our guests and provide an amazing experience.  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: I arrived for work to stay 2 weeks. Front Office Manager, Rajvi Shah and the entire  front desk staff was helpful and friendly. My room was beautiful, clean, spacious and the bed was very comfortable. My Suite had a view of the mountains in the distance, but the views of the pool and lagoon are also gorgeous. This hotel was a welcome treat, and I am so happy to have stayed here.
Manager Response: Hello Stuart M,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing Rajvi and team.  Our goal is to connect with our guests and provide an amazing experience.  It’s great to hear that the team is accomplishing this goal.  We appreciate your business and glad we are able to provide some great views while you enjoy our hotel.    Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary Heading: Marie is the life of the hotel
Summary: Marie at the bar is a sweet heart and a pleasure to talk with. I would highly recommend this hotel for your stay and recomend checking out the bar and the good vibes.  Will definitely be back! 20/10 would recommend
Manager Response: Hello 3lanek,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience and recognizing Marie.  We love our newly renovated hotel and our beautiful bar, but Marie and our amazing staff is truly what makes our hotel special.    Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: I’m a Lifetime Titanium Elite.  So been there and stayed there around the world!  I was so impressed by Sabrina at the Front Desk!  She went above and beyond taking care of my tech and meeting needs!  Looking for a great location with amazing service?  Stay here in OC
Manager Response: Hello Kay H,  You are a true road warrior, congratulations on your Lifetime Titanium Elite status.  We appreciate your loyalty to Marriott.  I'm thrilled to hear that Sabrina did a great job and it means a lot since it is coming from a seasoned traveler.    Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: I had a problem with check in when I arrived from a very long 10 hour drive. Vanessa H and Christopher L were absolutely incredible. Vanessa stayed late and Christopher worked his magic to get me accommodated as quickly as possible.  They were friendly, they were caring and took great care of my during my visit. They are excellent faces for Marriott Costa Mesa
Manager Response: Hello Camper61033582615,  Thank you for taking some time to share your experience.  Sorry you had a challenge when checking in.  I’m thrilled Vanessa and Chris did everything possible to take care of you and allow you to have a great stay.  We have a beautifully newly renovated hotel, but in reality it’s the associates that care so much that truly make the difference.      Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary Heading: The Best Value with Great Garden & Lake View, Plus SPA
Summary: Although Costa Mesa Marriott is a category 4 hotel (It does not offer a valid parking and room services), it gives you a better value in my opinion because most guests do not use the aforementioned two services at all.  I enjoyed its 11-loader SPA with a unique design to shield winds with a very good garden and lake view, especially in winter time, in addition to newly installed LED lights that can even illuminate sky and all tall palm trees in the night. Turning on a fire pit is very easy.  No wonder a 24-member Magical Cirque Christmas team from Texas chosen the Costa Mesa Marriott over other nearby hotels for the best value and comfort for two nights. I met and had a great conversation with a main character, magician, at the SPA, and learned she and the entire team enjoying
Manager Response: Hello jeremyl181,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience.  I'm glad you were able to enjoy our hotel and share the great value.  Hotel in newly renovated, largest standard rooms in market and as you mentioned M Club opening mid-January.  Exciting times at the Costa Mesa Marriott and thrilled you enjoyed new lighting, bar patio and fire pit.    Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary Heading: Still in startup mode last September
Summary: There are a lot more guests at Costa Mesa Marriott than before.  We checked in at about 1:30 pm. We were in room 636 with a view of the apartment building next door, a view we had never seen before.  The view made us appreciate the 15 or so times that we had enjoyed nicer views of either Anton Blvd or the pool in years past.  The room was nicely renovated, and everything looked brand new.  The staff were all friendly, cheerful, and eager to help.  We went downstairs at 6:45 pm and sat at a table at aMuse Restaurant in the lobby.  The menu was much more basic than the menu shown on the hotel information sheet. We shared a turkey, bacon, avocado, tomato sandwich with fries. More than half of the menu was for cocktails and wine. The hotel lobby was very busy, and the only elevator
Manager Response: Hello Staidthere,  Thank you for your recent stay.  Wonderful to hear you stay with us often.  I’m excited to hear your positive responses regarding our renovation and friendly staff.  I also have spoken with my leadership team to address the concerns you listed.  We will continue to work on restaurant experience, menu offering and staffing.  Your feedback is appreciated as it will assist us in improving and providing a more enjoyable stay for all of our guests.   Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary: As a fellow Marriott Associate and frequent traveler I truly appreciate the outstanding level of service this hotel provided. At check in they recognized my Platinum Elite status and acknowledged our anniversary celebration! Every morning at breakfast Rachel went above and beyond to exceed our expectations. She remembered what we liked to drink and to apply my associate discount. Our last morning there Stephanie served us and was just as wonderful! She always had a smile on her face and was so friendly. Thank you all for making this stay a fabulous first stop on our anniversary trip!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Marriott Costa Mesa
Summary: Had never stayed at this Marriott location before.. however as a Titanium traveler have plenty of experience with the brand. This is a great location and hotel is refreshed. The staff were all AMAZING  - which hasn't been easy during these Covid travel times. The front desk super helpful and we particularly enjoyed Marie at the bar! The hotel was rather quiet, but that isn't always a bad thing :) Would definitely stay again on the next trip to SoCal.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Natalie, at the front desk, really went above and beyond.  During my stay,  she provided top service.  I would definitely stay at this hotel again if business brings me back in the area.  Thank you Natalie!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We come to this hotel every week for work.  We stay here because the service at the bar/lounge/restaurant is outstanding. Marie is the bartender and server and no matter how busy the place is she hustles to make sure everyone is served promptly. Marie is outstanding and the main reason we stay here. Once we stayed at another hotel nearby (Hilton) and would never stay there again because that bartender was miserable and not friendly. For us, the Marriott Costa Mesa is the only place to stay her,  thanks to Marie.  We highly recommend the Costa Mesa Marriott and Marie.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Praise to Natalie and Nick! They helped me to settle in more easy and we’re able to accommodate all that I needed! They were understanding and quick and  so friendly! The hotel is beautiful, the rooms are so nice and the pool is glorious! We are here a week for work and I wish we were staying longer! Thanks y’all!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I Was in room 509 which had an excellent view of the fountain & walking pathway below. The room was spacious & clean.  The bed was very comfortable with 2 big screen tvs for viewing pleasure & a pull out sofa if needed. The staff was incredible with a special thank you to Sabrina. Her customer service was incredible & because of her I became a Bonvoy Marriott member.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent customer service.  The staff went out of their way to ensure I had a great experience. I will certainly stay here in the future. Sabrina and Nick were excellent.  I had a great experience overall.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This would be my first review ever!!   I travel for business and stay in Hotels six+ months a year. I had some business in S. California for 6 weeks and stayed at the Costa Mesa Marriott Hotel.  I have stayed at countless Hotels some with more luxury and some with less. Costa Mesa Marriott easily holds true to its star rating. Very clean and a great location. I would definitely stay with my family without question.  The reason for this review is because of the the Staff.  Within 2 days of my arrival everybody I came in contact with addressed me by name and always with a smile. I know hospitality from living it and this kind of service is from well trained employees who were genuinely happy to be back to work!!  For this reason I would give an additional Star and will be staying
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ambassador guest having traveled through the pandemic! Friendly employees and great customer service while being understaffed. Stéphanie and Stephen were in particularly amazing performing under stress and cool as a cucumber!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We are so thankful for all the help Ragvi did to exceed our expectations. After several emails and phone calls, she solved the problem when our reservation from a third party did not show up. She also honored the special rate and even upgraded our rooms. We are truly blessed!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay was fabulous. Two of the most friendly and helpful check in staff, Shawna and Rachel. Both girls were very accommodating and knowledgeable of the surrounding area. Rooms were comfortable and clean. Close to freeway, lots of restaurants and shopping.  Hotel grounds are  beautiful and peaceful.  Thank you Rachel and Shawna for going up and above to make my stay one of the best.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location is perfect walking distance from restaurants and shopping. It was very clean and staff were friendly and helpful. One of the staff Elisa helped me find my room when I got lost from drinking a few cocktails from the hotel bar.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for a night out in Newport Beach. Easy parking option with the garage and short Lyft into Newport.  Room was clean and well laid out. The first room has a couch and a large TV for comfy viewing. There is also a floor to ceiling window letting in plenty of sun. The bedroom also has a large tv and its own private balcony. With the curtains and lighting you can range from fish bowl to total privacy. We were on the east side of the building facing the apartment homes. The other side has a much better view of the pool and lake. This was no problem for us as we were just there for an exciting night of fun. The hotel fit the bill perfectly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean hotel. Fantastic location, you can walk everywhere you want to go! So many options and choices!! Bar is nice and service is excellent! Exercise room is fully functional!  Maid service is by request due to the lack of workers but You’re able to get what you need upon request
Manager Response: Hello D2958KProyd,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience.  I'm glad you were able to enjoy our bar and exercise room.  I'll make sure front desk team is communicating housekeeping services at check-in so all of our guests are well informed.   Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Warm regards, Hector Santa Cruz

Summary Heading: The Room And Service Surpassed Our Expectations And Is A Great Place To Stay
Summary: With travel opportunities returning more frequently; we have had the chance to increase our coverage and recently enjoyed a trip to Costa Mesa California. Our trip started with some coverage of Knott’s Berry Farm and after a busy and chaotic evening; we made our way to the hotel.  The property is located near the South Coast Plaza shopping center which offers several dining and shopping options and there are numerous dining opportunities all within a short drive of the hotel.  Our check-in was very pleasant and the very modern and spacious lobby, lounge, and aMuse dining options.
